FEAR MANIFESTO - Grossmann's art installation

Fear Manifesto is a labyrinth of paths, entered as through narrow hallways, which is inhabited by human fears.

“The path” is full of symbolism and draws inspiration from various literary classics and legends.

Concept / Creative Director: Urška Majdič

VIP Host: Sonya Scarlet (Ita), pevka in igralka

DOOMSDAY WALK

Walk of the postapocalyptic monsters on the final day of the festival.

Masking took place under the supervision of Mad Squirrel FX from Belgrade, Serbia.

LITTLE FX WORKSHOP

The first Special FX workshop in Slovenia, with the professional special FX crew Mad Squirrel FX from Belgrade, Serbia!

With their help the participants discovered the secrets of special effects on film and had a unique opportunity to make the masks of demons, mutants, ghouls, cyborgs and other post-apocalyptic creatures. The masks made in the workshop joined the Doomsday Walk on the final day of the festival.

ACTING WORKSHOPS: Method Acting for Everyone

Workshops were based on the Strasberg method and leaned on sensory memory and concentration practice.

They were not meant just for actors or those who possess a talent for acting, but for everyone who speaks in public, all those who are curious and everyone who would like to get rid of their fear of public speaking.

Workshop Leader: Žiga Čamernik, theatre actor and free-lance journalist

WINE PROGRAM

Presentation of wine makers and competing wines at the symbolic wine road

Presentations of winemakers at 18:40h in the Culture House Cinema prior to the main screening of the day.

Meeting of local Wine Queens of Slovenia and a wine tasting Event called Wine Queens and the Delights from Vineyards. Each queen presented her wine, typical of the region she represents.

Salon of Film and Wine, traditional collaboration with salon Jeruzalem, at the Culture House Cinema lobby. Special Guest of the Event was the Wine Queen of Slovenia 2012 Martina Baškovič who also gave away the Wine Champion Vicious Cat award at the closing ceremony on Saturday.
